Detailed Description

Configuration descriptor parser API. This section of the library gives a friendly API which can be used in host applications to easily parse an attached device's configuration descriptor so that endpoint, interface and other descriptor data can be extracted and used as needed.

Generated on 1 Dec 2009 for LUFA (Formerly MyUSB) Library by  1.6.1
